findings.title: Insecure defaults in generated artifacts
findings.description: JKube can generate Kubernetes deployment artifacts and deploy applications using those artifacts. By default, many of the security features offered by Kubernetes are not enabled in these artifacts.

findings.title: Risk of command line injection from secret
findings.description: An attacker can inject malicious commands by controlling a secret used in an unsanitized command string, compromising the user's machine.
